name: Help Bob
description:
You're not in control of Bob, he can handle himself. It's your job to make sure he survives. Increase his stats and watch things go wild out of your control!

Improve, adapt, overcome!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 event with a 48 hour time limit where the theme was "Out of Control".

Credit where credit's due:

  • Unity Technologies for the Standard Assets
  • ALP8310 for the asset pack Terrain Textures Pack Free
  • Tallbeard Studios / Abstraction for the amazing music assets Three Red Hearts - Prepare to Dev Edition of which i used the tracks: 
    • Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Pixel War 1 
    • Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Pixel War 2
  • Kenney for the sound effects in the asset pack Kenney Game Assets 1.

Thank you for playing, rating, and commenting!

Have fun!
